co.cask.coopr.provisioner

Interface ProvisionerRequestService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpProvisionerRequestService

    public interface ProvisionerRequestService
    Service for making requests to provisioners.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteTenant(Provisioner provisioner, String tenantId)
      Make a request to the provisioner to delete the given tenant.
      boolean putTenant(Provisioner provisioner, String tenantId, ResourceCollection resourceCollection)
      Make a request to the provisioner to set the tenant information, such as number of workers and plugin resources it should be using.
      boolean putTenantResources(Provisioner provisioner, String tenantId, ResourceCollection resourceCollection)
      Make a request to the provisioner to set the plugin resources it should be using.
      boolean putTenantWorkers(Provisioner provisioner, String tenantId)
      Make a request to the provisioner to set the number of workers for the given tenant.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteTenant

        boolean deleteTenant(Provisioner provisioner,
                   String tenantId)
        Make a request to the provisioner to delete the given tenant.
        Parameters:
        provisioner - Provisioner to send the request to.
        tenantId - Id of the tenant to remove from the provisioner.
        Returns:
        True if the request was successful, false if not.

      • putTenant

        boolean putTenant(Provisioner provisioner,
                String tenantId,
                ResourceCollection resourceCollection)
        Make a request to the provisioner to set the tenant information, such as number of workers and plugin resources it should be using.
        Parameters:
        provisioner - Provisioner to send the request to.
        tenantId - Id of the tenant on the provisioner to write to.
        resourceCollection - Metadata for all resources that can be used by the tenant workers for the provisioner.
        Returns:
        True if the request was successful, false if not.

      • putTenantWorkers

        boolean putTenantWorkers(Provisioner provisioner,
                       String tenantId)
        Make a request to the provisioner to set the number of workers for the given tenant.
        Parameters:
        provisioner - Provisioner to send the request to.
        tenantId - Id of the tenant on the provisioner to write to.
        Returns:
        True if the request was successful, false if not.

      • putTenantResources

        boolean putTenantResources(Provisioner provisioner,
                         String tenantId,
                         ResourceCollection resourceCollection)
        Make a request to the provisioner to set the plugin resources it should be using.
        Parameters:
        provisioner - Provisioner to send the request to.
        tenantId - Id of the tenant on the provisioner to write to.
        resourceCollection - Metadata for all resources that can be used by the tenant workers for the provisioner.
        Returns:
        True if the request was successful, false if not.
